00040 /// struct for holding isotope information
00041 struct MassAbundance
00042 {
00043     double mass;
00044     double abundance;
00045 
00046     MassAbundance(double m = 0, double a = 0)
00047     :   mass(m), abundance(a)
00048     {}
00049 
00050     bool operator==(const MassAbundance& that) const;
00051     bool operator!=(const MassAbundance& that) const;
00052 };
00053 
00054 
00055 /// struct for holding isotope distribution
00056 typedef std::vector<MassAbundance> MassDistribution;
00057 
00058 
00059 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const MassAbundance& ma);
00060 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const MassDistribution& md);

00063 /// scope for declarations related to elements
00064 namespace Element {

00066 
00067 /// enumeration of the elements
00068 enum Type
00069 {
00070     H, He, Li, Be, B, C, N, O, F, Ne, 
00071     Na, Mg, Al, Si, P, S, Cl, Ar, K, Ca, 
00072     Sc, Ti, V, Cr, Mn, Fe, Co, Ni, Cu, Zn, 
00073     Ga, Ge, As, Se, Br, Kr, Rb, Sr, Y, Zr, 
00074     Nb, Mo, Tc, Ru, Rh, Pd, Ag, Cd, In, Sn, 
00075     Sb, Te, I, Xe, Cs, Ba, La, Ce, Pr, Nd, 
00076     Pm, Sm, Eu, Gd, Tb, Dy, Ho, Er, Tm, Yb, 
00077     Lu, Hf, Ta, W, Re, Os, Ir, Pt, Au, Hg, 
00078     Tl, Pb, Bi, Po, At, Rn, Fr, Ra, Ac, Th, 
00079     Pa, U, Np, Pu, Am, Cm, Bk, Cf, Es, Fm, 
00080     Md, No, Lr, Rf, Db, Sg, Bh, Hs, Mt, Uun, 
00081     Uuu, Uub, Uuq, Uuh
00082 };
00083 
00084 
00085 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, Type type);

00088 /// class for obtaining information about elements
00089 class Info
00090 {
00091     public:
00092 
00093     Info();
00094     ~Info();
00095 
00096     /// structure for holding info about an element
00097     struct Record
00098     {
00099         Type type;
00100         std::string symbol;
00101         int atomicNumber;
00102         double atomicWeight;
00103         MassDistribution isotopes;
00104     };
00105 
00106     /// retrieve the record for an element
00107     const Record& operator[](Type type) const;
00108 
00109     private:
00110 
00111     /// hidden implementation
00112     class Impl;
00113     std::auto_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00114 
00115     // don't allow copying
00116     Info(const Info&);
00117     const Info& operator=(const Info&);
00118 };
00119 
00120 
00121 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Info::Record& record);
00122 
00123 
00124 } // namespace Element

00127 /// class to represent a chemical formula
00128 class Formula
00129 {
00130     public:
00131 
00132     /// formula string given by symbol/count pairs, e.g. water: "H2 O1" (whitespace optional)  
00133     Formula(const std::string& formula = "");
00134     Formula(const Formula& formula);
00135     const Formula& operator=(const Formula& formula);
00136     ~Formula();
00137 
00138     double monoisotopicMass() const;
00139     double molecularWeight() const;
00140     std::string formula() const;
00141 
00142     /// access to the Element's count in the formula
00143     int operator[](Element::Type e) const;
00144     int& operator[](Element::Type e);
00145 
00146     // direct access to the map, for iteration
00147     typedef std::map<Element::Type, int> Map;
00148     const Map& data() const;
00149 
00150     // operations
00151     Formula& operator+=(const Formula& that);    
00152     Formula& operator-=(const Formula& that);    
00153     Formula& operator*=(int scalar);
00154     
00155     private:
00156     class Impl;
00157     std::auto_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00158 };
00159 
00160 
00161 Formula operator+(const Formula& a, const Formula& b);
00162 Formula operator-(const Formula& a, const Formula& b);
00163 Formula operator*(const Formula& a, int scalar);
00164 Formula operator*(int scalar, const Formula& a);
00165 
00166 
00167 /// output a Formula
00168 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Formula& formula);
